engChrName: You served me well in Basel.
engSearchText: You served me well in Basel.
jpnChrName: ──バーゼルの件はご苦労だった。
jpnSearchText: ──バーゼルの件はご苦労だった。

engChrName: We could have had quite the crisis on our hands if events had been allowed to play out as our foes wanted.
engSearchText:
We could have had quite the crisis on our hands if
events had been allowed to play out as our
foes wanted.
jpnChrName: 危機管理的にも難しい状況を 見事、クリアしてくれたようだね。
jpnSearchText:
危機管理的にも難しい状況を
見事、クリアしてくれたようだね。

engChrName: Thank you, sir—though I believe most of the credit goes to our agent in the field and the principality's representatives.
engSearchText:
Thank you, sir—though I believe most of the credit
goes to our agent in the field and the
principality's representatives.
jpnChrName: いえ、担当スタッフと公国側の “代理人”たちがよくやってくれました。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、担当スタッフと公国側の
“代理人”たちがよくやってくれました。

engChrName: I will admit that I did not anticipate you hiring Marduk to act when they did, however.
engSearchText:
I will admit that I did not anticipate you hiring
Marduk to act when they did, however.
jpnChrName: ……あのタイミングでＭＫ社を動かす 契約をされていたのは予想外でしたが。
jpnSearchText:
……あのタイミングでＭＫ社を動かす
契約をされていたのは予想外でしたが。

engChrName: They will do whatever you ask so long as the price is right. It makes them rather convenient in times like these.
engSearchText:
They will do whatever you ask so long as the price
is right. It makes them rather convenient in times
like these.
jpnChrName: なに、ミラ次第で動く連中だ。 色々使い勝手がいいというだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
なに、ミラ次第で動く連中だ。
色々使い勝手がいいというだけさ。

engChrName: There are advantages to their being a neutral organization beholden to no government—even if using their services requires an...objective mindset.
engSearchText:
There are advantages to their being a neutral
organization beholden to no government—even if
using their services requires an...objective mindset.
jpnChrName: 本質的に中立でしかない外国企業── どこまでも割り切る必要はあるがね。
jpnSearchText:
本質的に中立でしかない外国企業──
どこまでも割り切る必要はあるがね。

engChrName: I imagine you can see their merits as well, Professor Cronkite?
engSearchText:
I imagine you can see their merits as well,
Professor Cronkite?
jpnChrName: そういう在り方は君も嫌いではないだろう、 ──ヤン・クロンカイト教授？
jpnSearchText:
そういう在り方は君も嫌いではないだろう、
──ヤン・クロンカイト教授？

engChrName: I do. At least they are competent, unlike a certain superior of mine that I could name.
engSearchText:
I do. At least they are competent, unlike a certain
superior of mine that I could name.
jpnChrName: ええ、無能な経営陣に 使われるよりはずっと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、無能な経営陣に
使われるよりはずっと。

engChrName: I don't disagree. The time is long past due for Verne to appoint a new CEO.
engSearchText:
I don't disagree. The time is long past due for Verne
to appoint a new CEO.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌのＣＥＯが そろそろ替え時なのは間違いない。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌのＣＥＯが
そろそろ替え時なのは間違いない。

engChrName: We can maintain the status quo as long as Professor Hamilton remains in the Republic...
engSearchText:
We can maintain the status quo as long as Professor
Hamilton remains in the Republic...
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士が戻られている間は “現状維持”で構わないだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士が戻られている間は
“現状維持”で構わないだろうが……

engChrName: ...but as soon as she departs, we will indeed make the necessary arrangements.
engSearchText:
...but as soon as she departs, we will indeed make the
necessary arrangements.
jpnChrName: 再び離れられたタイミングで すぐにでも計らうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
再び離れられたタイミングで
すぐにでも計らうとしよう。

engChrName: I see no issue with that timeline.
engSearchText: I see no issue with that timeline.
jpnChrName: ええ、それがいいでしょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それがいいでしょう。

engChrName: Now, as we previously agreed, I think it's about time you got to work.
engSearchText:
Now, as we previously agreed, I think it's about time
you got to work.
jpnChrName: ──それでは予定通り、 今後は本腰を入れてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
──それでは予定通り、
今後は本腰を入れてもらおうか？

engChrName: After all, this project will bring about massive change to the Republic—to the entire world.
engSearchText:
After all, this project will bring about massive change
to the Republic—to the entire world.
jpnChrName: 共和国に、いや世界そのものに 確かな“変革”を促していく計画。
jpnSearchText:
共和国に、いや世界そのものに
確かな“変革”を促していく計画。

engChrName: Nothing will be the same after the Republican Army's Zeku Space Base is completed and in operation.
engSearchText:
Nothing will be the same after the Republican Army's
Zeku Space Base is completed and in operation.
jpnChrName: カルバード共和国軍── 《ゼクー宇宙軍基地》の完成と運用開始に。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード共和国軍──
《ゼクー宇宙軍基地》の完成と運用開始に。

jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【バーゼルへの出張業務】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【バーゼルへの出張業務】の
報酬として
